mapper.sql: ID, NAME, SEX, START_AGE, END_AGE, ONE, TWO, THREE, FOUR, FIVE,NUM
mapper.select:
select
from (select * from standard where START_AGE < #{startAge,jdbcType=INTEGER} and SEX = #{sex,jdbcType=CHAR} order by id DESC ) as t group by NAME order by NUM
mapper.insert: insert into standard (ID, NAME, SEX, START_AGE, END_AGE, ONE, TWO, THREE, FOUR, FIVE) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sex,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{startAge,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{endAge,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{one,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{two,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{three,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{four,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{five,jdbcType=DOUBLE})

mapper.update:
update standard
NAME = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SEX = #{sex,jdbcType=CHAR},
START_AGE = #{startAge,jdbcType=INTEGER},
END_AGE = #{endAge,jdbcType=INTEGER},
ONE = #{one,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
TWO = #{two,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
THREE = #{three,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
FOUR = #{four,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
FIVE = #{five,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
where ID = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update standard set NAME = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SEX = #{sex,jdbcType=CHAR}, START_AGE = #{startAge,jdbcType=INTEGER}, END_AGE = #{endAge,jdbcType=INTEGER}, ONE = #{one,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, TWO = #{two,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, THREE = #{three,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, FOUR = #{four,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, FIVE = #{five,jdbcType=DOUBLE} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
